chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has a problem:
Hello I would like to change the name of the bill
Thanks,

Dear ecomobile

This is Laura from the Back Market team.

The customer contacted us because he needs the invoice, please generate it and send us in the next 24 business hours.

This is the customer data:  Carolina Gonzalez Guerra

I will be attentive to your answer.

Have a good day.

Regards,
Laura from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the invoice in this message. Do let me know if the customer still requires any further assistance. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
